law.catch_line: Members of boards of education shall be elected on a nonpartisan basis....

section.section: Members of boards of education shall be elected on a nonpartisan basis.

In a primary election to nominate board of education candidates, any registered voter of the county, regardless of party affiliation or lack of party affiliation, is eligible to vote in those contests for nomination.

text.section: This section does not apply to candidates for nomination or election to a board of education if Title 3 of the Education Article requires a partisan election.
